member.summary: Creates a new message box with the specified name. If null is specified in the message name then the message box is not managed by the Manager and will be disposed automatically after a call to Show()
member.param: The name of the message box

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.FarsiMessageBoxExManager.CreateMessageBox(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new message box with the specified name. If null is specified in the message name then the message box is not managed by the Manager and will be disposed automatically after a call to Show(). Set IsRightToLeft value if the control is a Farsi message box, else set it to false, or use the overloaded method.
member.param: The name of the message box
Is it a FarsiMessageBox or it should be in english.

member.summary: Gets the message box with the specified name

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Drawing.GDIUtils.Draw3DLine(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Point,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Draw 3d Line. 3D Line is a simple line wich contains one dark and one light line. By dark and light line we create optical 3D effect.
member.param: Graphics object which used by function to draw
Start point
End point

member.summary: Draw 3D box according to style specification. There are four styles which our function know how to draw.
member.param: Graphics object used for drawing
Box rectangle
Style of Box
